sql.query: SELECT L.lpID, L.lpCode, L.lpName, L.lpEmail, replace( L.phoneNumber1+ L.phoneNumber2+ L.phoneNumber3, ' ', '') as phoneNumber, L.lpLevel, replace(A.agencyName, ' ', '') AS agencyName, A.agencycode as agencycode, H.photouploadname as picture --H.accesscode H.selectCode, FROM prudb.dbo.LifePlanner L, prudb.dbo.PRUDB_TBL_LP_BaseInfomation H, prudb.dbo.Agency A WHERE lpCode IN ( SELECT lpCode FROM prudb.dbo.insurancePolicy WHERE ownerSsn=? OR insurantSsn=? ) AND L.lpID = H.lpID AND L.agencyCode = A.agencyCode UNION SELECT L.lpID, L.lpCode, L.lpName, L.lpEmail, replace( L.phoneNumber1+ L.phoneNumber2+ L.phoneNumber3, ' ', '') as phoneNumber, L.lpLevel, replace(A.agencyName, ' ', '') AS agencyName, A.agencycode as agencycode, H.photouploadname as picture --H.accesscode H.selectCode FROM dbo.PRUDB_TBL_UserInfo U, prudb.dbo.LifePlanner L, prudb.dbo.PRUDB_TBL_LP_BaseInfomation H , prudb.dbo.Agency A WHERE U.ssn=? AND U.lpID = L.lpID AND U.lpID = H.lpID AND L.agencyCode = A.agencyCode

mapping.getProperty: lpid, lpcode, lpname, lpemail, phone, lplevel, agencyname, agencycode, picture
